> <OLD>
>
> Hydras woke up and he didnt know to feel surpriced or in rage "Where WE
> are??? why have you lost for so long" Hissed the Predacon commander while he
> started a quick chekc out of where he was or what had happened in his body

<NEW>

HYDRAS awakened laying on some sort of bed with JHIAXUS standing over
him. The 'room' was quite small with electronic cabling and computer
consoles lining the walls. There are view screens at strategic points.
It seemed to be almost like a small laboratory.

"Where have we been?" JHIAXUS said as he frowned as he looked somewhat
confused. "I am not sure." He said after a moment. "All I remember is
that you had just accepted Cyclonus and Scourge back into your ranks
and we received order from you to go on guard patrol."

SCORPONOK walked in the room, "Yes, we got to the location and then .
. . nothing."

JHIAXUS nodded, "We woke up recently in a room full of others. I saw
Cheetor, Rhinox and a few others."

There was a grunt from SCORPONOK, "Yeah, we should have destroyed them."

"There was no time." JHIAXUS cut in. "We got you and got out of there,
but you look bit different now."

And it was this point that HYDRAS' internal diagnostics came back with
something startling, one of his Sparks had been stolen - GALVATRON's
spark was no longer a part of him.

(OOC: Feel free to describe any changes to Hydras' form as you like Airly)

(TAG)

- Preston
